name: The Tree World
description:
Info: This is a simple puzzle game. This game is made for fun to try the CopperCube game engine.

It has been made in 2 days.

Story:

You live in a forest, you found a weird looking tree and you wanted to take a look at it.

But when you came to it, something weird happened, the tree has moved you to its world!

You need to find weird items in the tree world to help recover that tree.
